channel.title: Need help with client please
channel.description: when I try change the sprites to my client, I've changed them and they won't change... I don't now why it just Keeps the old ones. I want to add new ones but it won't change for me. Can someone help? If so add me please.. Premium-Elite@hotmail.co.uk That's my Skype I'm called anthony Reed

item.title: Need help with client please
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

convert them into something useable by the client, there’s normally a .Bat that you can run. str0ngscap3 is right.

Read full topic
